short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Minion Escape is a simple and fun game by moving the propeller towards the direction you need to move

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Minion Escape is a simple and interesting game. By moving the propeller towards the moving lever, the mimion will fly in that direction and overcome walls and obstacles. Your job is to cleverly pass through the gaps so as not to collide with any obstacles to win
